projects.title: Airflow ETL Pipeline
projects.description: Built an ETL pipeline using Airflow and Docker to extract, transform, and load data from an API into a PostgreSQL database.

projects.title: Linear Regression Model
projects.description: Implemented a simple Linear Regression Model to predict the yearly amount spent by customers.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation
projects.description: Implemented K-means clustering to segment customers based on their purchasing behavior.
